entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Steinbach

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow early in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
